name: Gold Miner (itch) (Lucas Ballard)
description:
Do you like gold and gems?

Are rocks your mortal enemy?

Then you just might be a Gold Miner at heart!

Live out your dream as a miner in this short arcade style game and see if you can bring in the payday you deserve!

Left click when the hook is aligned with a gem or piece of gold to grab it and bring it back in adding to your wealth.

Avoid the rocks that take forever to reel in and steal your money too!

Did I mention you are on the clock? Make every second count or you won't make it!

This project is the result of completing an assignment for Game Development I at the University of Central Missouri. Finished Oct. 28th, 2021
